solution_line_template: If Reese practices {hours_per_week} four hours every week, in a month, with {weeks_per_month} weeks, he would have practiced for {hours_per_week}*{weeks_per_month} = <<{hours_per_week}*{weeks_per_month}={hours_per_month}>>{hours_per_month} hours.
In five months, Reese would have practiced for {num_months}*{hours_per_month} = <<{num_months}*{hours_per_month}={total_practice_hours}>>{total_practice_hours} hours
